ygData.subject: Atma the Weapon...
ygData.msgSnippet: Atma realized he was still wanted. He tried to think of a role he could take as he walked back to base. Sorry for running out on you, leader, I was just angry

Atma realized he was still wanted. He tried to think of a role he could take
as he walked back to base.

"Sorry for running out on you, leader, I was just angry that nobody trusted
me, I shall return now." Atma said, through commlink, to Blackarachnia.
Psuedo sighed in relief. He felt some kind of connection with Atma and
didn't want it broken.

"So, anyway, Atma told me he would have liked it if everyone just said that
they didn't want him as second in command, but the way they rejected him,
that's what snapped him like a twig." Psuedo said...
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2000 8:52 AM
Subject: Re: SAB, getting outwitted by a midget...


>     With the battle rageing on at the Ark, Adrax circles the sky like a
> hellish vulture in his demonic beast mode. The grappling gun pokes out
from
> his mouth as he sees the little bots scurrying about on the surface. This
> plases him, because he could swoop down and possbile eat one of them.
>     Something in the distance shines in his eyes. Its one of the Ark's
> support beams. It stands there mocking him. A challenge. If he were to
knock
> the support down, the entire front of the Ark would collapse.
>     "AH, I have foreseen your demise Maximals! The Ark shall be
destroyed!"
> He said, his body coiling and curving like a serphant.
>     Finally he swooped from the sky, his body ridged like a missle that
would
> destroy the Ark. His grappling gun sent a spitfire of bullets hailing down
on
> the warriors below as he got closer to the Ark.
>     Now, be neath the body of the vessle, he saw the support beam. It
> strained under the weight of the ship. Most of the others had already
fallen
> or been destroyed. This was the conerstone to the Ark. And now it was
Adrax's.
>     He coiled his long spiked body around the support, and then began to
> squeeze like a snake would squeeze its prey. Harder and harder he could
heat
> the iron graon under the pressure. Adrax began to jerk his body, pulling
the
> pole in a different direction. He jerked agian, and agian. The pole began
to
> become crooked. Seeing at what he had done, he slipped off the beam and
took
> a look at it. Now it was bent severly. Just a little more work and it
would
> collapse.
>
>     Black Aracnia shighed as she took the Comm unit to talk into once
agian.
> She picked up on Atma. "Listen, Atma. We need good warriors like yourself.
> Without you we could have never repelled the attack from the Maximals
> earlier. In fact, thats why were attacking the Ark now. To punish them. We
> are better than them, you are far superior to them Atma. Please dont
leave.
> Come home, to where you belong."
>
> 
>
>
>
